name: Zlug Rush
description:
Zlug Rush Is Intense!

Survive inside dynamic levels that load instantly. Control time to stack your shots and grab power ups as you go. The better you get the faster they are.

Can you get to 5,000 points?

Controls

Movement
W = Move Up
A = Move Left
S = Move Down
D = Move Right

Control Time
HOLD Shift = Pause Time
LET GO Shift = Unpause Time
Space = Slow Down Time

Shooting
Mouse to aim
Left click to shoot!

R = Pause Game

Hints

1. Keep moving!
2. Do not rest. Ever.
3. Corners are very dangerous!
4. Pause time & shoot in a circle.
5. Watch out for rocks.
6. Save time warp power ups for when you're low.
7. Use first aid kits wisely...
